title: Couscous salad
description: A hearty couscous salad that is so simple to make. For a slightly different flavour, use the zest and juice of one lime. Serve with plain grilled chicken or fish for an easy summer meal.Each serving provides 280kcal, 8g protein, 31g carbohydrate (of which 2g sugars), 13g fat (of which 2g saturates), 3g fibre and 0g salt.
ingredients: Â½ cucumber, de-seeded and finely diced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
